data: PED NEPH Hemodialysis Chronic Treatment
Admit/Transfer/Discharge
Restricted to Department of Nephrology
Patient Care
Hemodialysis
Please refer to HD Powerform for most recent HD prescription
Provide SBP goal to notify provider if SBP greater or less than indicated goal
Notify Treating Provider Vital Signs
Blood Pressure requirements
Height/Length
T;N, qmonth
Head Circumference
T;N
Vital Signs
Respiratory rate, blood pressure and heart rate
Temperature
Pre and post hemodialysis treatment and PRN
Intradialytic Hypotension
Conditional Order - Ongoing
If/when intradialytic hypotension, then order sodium chloride 0.9% 5 to 10 mL/kg (to a maximum of 250 mL) and notify provider

For Red Blood Cell priming, order from PED/NEO TM Red Blood (RBC) Cell Transfusion (Module) and discuss with transfusion medicine to dilute red blood cells with normal saline to a final hematocrit of 0.35
5% Albumin for Circuit Priming
Blood Product Fact Sheet 5% Albumin
Administer - Albumin 5% for Priming
Albumin 5%, Route of Administration: circuit, qMonWedFriSat, Administer each over: Not applicable, Indications: Hemodialysis Priming, T;N
Albumin 5%, Route of administration: circuit, qMonWedFri, Administer each over: Not applicable, Indications: Hemodialysis Priming, T;N
Albumin 5%, Route of administration: circuit, qMonFri, Administer each over: Not applicable, Indications: Hemodialysis Priming, T;N
